QuestData.Title: Priority Delivery
QuestData.Description: An adventurer of another time has forgotten to loot something big... something that might cause them great emotional strain if not received quickly.$B$BYour destination is Icecrown Citadel, your target the Lich King's corpse. Retrieve the missing item post-haste and deliver it to the stalwart adventurer - he should be somewhere at the Steam Pools in Feralas.$B$BMy assistant will open a portal to deliver you there. Just a moment!
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the forgotten loot from the Lich King and find its intended recipient at the Steam Pools in Feralas.

Objectives.Objective: Take the portal to the Frozen Throne
